site.name: CSViz
site.description: WiredViz is visualizatoin of data from Wiredcraft

GDP growth (annual %).name: GDP growth (annual %)
GDP growth (annual %).description: Sum of the Official Development Assistance disbursed to support activities in the basic education sector of development partner countries, as reported by donors and expressed as a percentage of Gross Domestic Product. Basic education aid includes flows directed to: primary education, basic life skills for youth and adults and early childhood education.

World Population.name: World Population
World Population.description: International Monetary Fund, World Economic Outlook Database (October 2013) and Organisation for Economic Cooperation and Development, Creditor Reporting System (December 2013)
